name: Sabotaj
description:
Let The Adventure Begin!


The first non-P2W free to play game developed in Turkey!



Sabotaj is an FPS game about the confrontation of Tactic (Agent) and Force (Soldier) forces. Force Organization consists of Turkish soldiers who love their homeland. Tactic Organization, on the other hand, consists of agents of different nationalities. All characters to be classified as terrorists involve in the Tactic Organization and all have foreign names.

Features of The Game


Everyone is equal in this game! No weapon rental! The only native FPS game developed in Turkey where the money-giving is not superior!



You can play in 9 different maps by modeling real places which are strategic locations and important for tourists.
Agora
Fort Boyard
Kervansaray (Caravanserai)
Liman (Port)
Petrol Platformu (Oil Platform)
Ofis (Office)
Hangar
Galata (Istanbul)
Kalekol (Military Base Located in Mountains)



Be ready to play Sabotaj which is totaly developed by Turkish engineers using own Turkish local resources. Prize tournaments, clan matches, individual events and huge prize pool await for you! Prize tournaments, clan matches, individual events and huge prize pools await you. All you have to do is download the game and start playing now.
